column1: UK household energy and nutrient intakes derived from food and drink
Average intake per person per day

column2: Energy from all sources excluding alcohol

column1: Average intake as a percentage of food energy excluding energy from alcohol
Average intake as a percentage of weighted reference nutrient intakes
(a) Contributions from pharmaceutical sources are not recorded by the survey and no account has been made for food bought but not eaten
(e) Relative Standard Error: 3 ticks: < 2.5%, 2 ticks: 2.5% - 5%, 1 tick: 5% - 10%, no ticks: 10% - 20%, cross: >20%, - not available
(f) "yes" if the change is greater than twice its standard error.  There is approximately a one in twenty chance of reporting a "yes" when the change is due only to sampling error.
(g) Ticked if the estimate of linear trend is statistically significant, see methodology papers
